sqls.statement: SELECT SUBSTR(cdid,1,2) gubn, cdid, cdnm FROM COM.ZBCMCODE where cdgrupid = 'CLNT0' UNION ALL SELECT distinct 'DEPT' gubn, CLNTDEPT cdid, CLNTDEPT cdnm FROM pam.gfmclntm order by 1, 2

SELECT NVL(clntgrup,' ')clntgrup, NVL(clntdept,' ')clntdept, NVL(clntuser,' ')clntuser, NVL(clntusip,' ')clntusip, NVL(clntfrdt,' ')clntfrdt, NVL(clnttodt,' ')clnttodt, NVL(clntrpdt,' ')clntrpdt, NVL(clntstat,' ')clntstat, NVL(clntpcfd,' ')clntpcfd, NVL(clntpclv,' ')clntpclv, NVL(clntmot1,' ')clntmot1, NVL(clntmot2,' ')clntmot2, NVL(clntcpuz,' ')clntcpuz, NVL(clntmemz,' ')clntmemz, NVL(clntgrpz,' ')clntgrpz, NVL(clntcard,' ')clntcard, NVL(clntusos,' ')clntusos, NVL(clntprg1,' ')clntprg1, NVL(clntprg2,' ')clntprg2, NVL(clntprg3,' ')clntprg3, NVL(clntprg4,' ')clntprg4, NVL(clntprg5,' ')clntprg5, NVL(clntmemo,' ')clntmemo, NVL(clntused,' ')clntused, NVL(clntmem2,' ')clntmem2, NVL(clntetc1,' ')clntetc1, NVL(clntoems,' ')clntoems, NVL(clntoscd,' ')clntoscd, NVL(clntchk1,' ')clntchk1, NVL(clntetc4,' ')clntetc4, substr(clntusip,9,1) clntip03, substr(clntusip,9,1)||TRIM(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(substr(clntusip,11,3)),'000')) clntip04, NVL(clntpidn,' ')clntpidn FROM PAM.GFMCLNTM WHERE clntstat != 'D'
AND CLNTGRUP like '%'||#hs_grup#||'%'
AND CLNTDEPT like '%'||#hs_dept#||'%'
AND CLNTUSIP BETWEEN #hs_frip# AND #hs_toip#||'Z'
AND CLNTUSER like '%'||#hs_user#||'%'
ORDER BY clntgrup,substr(clntusip,9,1)||TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(substr(clntusip,11,3)),'000'),clntdept

UPDATE PAM.GFMCLNTM SET clntyymm = #clntyymm# , clntidno = #clntidno# , clntname = #clntname# , clntuamt = #clntuamt# , clntuccd = #clntuccd# , clntfrdt = #clntfrdt# , clnttodt = #clnttodt# , clntkind = #clntkind# , clnteddt = #clnteddt# , clntmetp = #clntmetp# , clntrcno = #clntrcno# , clntcano = #clntcano# , clntstmt = #clntstmt# , clntmymt = NVL(#clntmymt#,0) , clntbkmt = NVL(#clntbkmt#,0) , clntcdmt = NVL(#clntcdmt#,0) , clntdcmt = NVL(#clntdcmt#,0) , clntadmt = NVL(#clntadmt#,0) , clntrtmt = NVL(#clntrtmt#,0) , clntetmt = NVL(#clntetmt#,0) , clntmddt = #clntmddt# , clntcont = #clntcont# , clntcgym = #clntcgym# , clntedfg = #clntedfg# , clntupdt = to_char(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , clntuser = #clntuser# , clntcamt = NVL(#clntcamt#,0) WHERE clntmddt = #clntmddt# AND clntidno = #clntidno# AND clntuccd = #clntuccd# AND clntkind = #clntkind# AND clntseqn = #clntseqn#
